timezone_tooltip: The survey will expire at 00:00 on the selected end date in your local timezone

ai_prompt_helper: Describe what kind of survey you want to create in as much detail as possible

error.first_name_too_long: First name must be 50 characters or less.
error.last_name_too_long: Last name must be 50 characters or less.
error.at_least_one_role: At least one role must be selected.

processed_errors.used_confirmation_token: This confirmation was already user. Try to login with the user you just registered
processed_errors.component_deleted: Cannot delete survey elements after survey was published
processed_errors.design_out_of_sync: Someone else is editing the survey design

email.confirmation_code2: , please enter the code in below box to verify your email.
email.code_characters: Code must be at least 6 numbers
email.email_changed: Your email has been updated successfully!

mobile_view: Mobile view is currently not supported
mobile_view_working: We're working hard to enable this feature!

tooltips.quotas: Enable quotas and set limits for the number of responses. This limit applies to both online and offline survey responses, depending on how frequently offline responses are synced.
tooltips.launch: You can adjust the survey settings and publish your survey
tooltips.raw_values: Show raw values instead of labels
tooltips.survey_url: Share this link to access the survey
tooltips.survey_dates:
Set start and end dates for your survey:
  • If no start date is set, the survey will be available immediately
  • If a future start date is set, the survey will become available on that date
  • If no end date is set, the survey will be available indefinitely
  • If a future end date is set, the survey will automatically close on that date
tooltips.survey_mode:
Select whether your survey will be available online, offline, or both:
  • Online surveys are accessible via web browsers
  • Offline surveys can be conducted without internet access
tooltips.create_new_survey: Create a new survey from scratch with a blank template
tooltips.import_survey: Import an existing survey (that was exported earlier) from a ZIP file
tooltips.create_survey_with_ai: Create a new survey automatically using AI assistance
tooltips.survey_title: Internal title used by your team to identify the survey. This title is not shown to respondents.
tooltips.survey_description: Internal description used by your team to provide context about the survey. This description is not shown to respondents.
